unnormalised: So, konnen tori Bharatantlea undergrad digree uprant mastersak borea kolejint bharti zanvchea prosesavixin vicharle. Mhaka dista ti ek lamb safar asa! Poilech fautim, tuje GATE scoreak khup mhotv asta. IITs ani NITsank 90 percentile vo tache poros unch melovpak prayatn kor. Tumchea applicationachi antim tarik doryant dovrat; sadharanponnan te Feb/Marchache aspas asta.
normalised: Taka, konnem tori Bharotantlea tumchea podvi ut'tor padvi khatir bori kolejint bhitor sorche prokrîye vixim vicharlem. Bare, tem ekdam bore vattenchî proxnôri! Poilem vostu, tumcho G-A-T-E gunn khûb mhotvacho. N-I-T-s ani I-I-T-s khatir ninety percentaile vo tekhauyleank uktem korun dôvorat. Tumche arzi dîna-modhotanche udent dîxent dôvorunk zai; sadharanponnim te februvari vo marcha bhovtileachem.

unnormalised: Dusrem mhonnlear, veglanchem toyari thodikuch zata. Khas streamsank, kaim kolej tumchea UG CGPAk vajan dita (uda. 7.5 vo tache poros unch tumka ek vishisht sthan divpak xokta). Toxench, sambandhit kamacho anubhav tumche profilekhuy vaddoita. Zar tumi khas projects vo internshipam keleat zannim tumche nirnayit vishayacho sangat asa (data science vo embedded systems bhaxen), tanka tumchea SOPant utkarx kor.
normalised: Magir, beginuch toyyar korunk lagat. Nirdisht pravahankhatir, kain kolej tumche podvi ut'tor C-G-P-A k weightage ditat (udaharonnarth, sat point panch vo tekhauyleank tumche khatir labh mellunk xakta). Toxench, sambandhit kamacho anubhav tumchi profile karkôr zâunk xakta. Tumche dâkha dîlea vixexataik (jexem data science vo embedded systems) zoddta tem proiect vo internships keleat zalear, te tumchea S-O-P-an nirdharan korat.

unnormalised: Atam, SOP (Statement of Purpose) khup mhotvacho asa. Taka kagdar ek lhan interview bhaxen vichar kor. *Kiteak* tum ti khas masteranchi digree gheunk sodtat ani *kiteak* ti khas kolej tumcheak sarkhi asa tem spasht kor. Dor ek SOP universityak sarkhem vaprat. Tumhi faculty ani tanchea sodachea vishayanche vishayen sod zala tem dakhoiat. Udahoron: "Prof. Sharmaachem AI-acher kam mhojea avdichea sangatant yeta...".
normalised: Atam, S-O-P (hetu-vivaran) mhotvachem. Kagôddar eklêchô lhan mulakhaat jexem têtê korat. Tumchea nirdisht padvi ut'tor korunk kiteak zai ani kiteak ti nirdisht kolej tumche khatir bore zateli tumi uxô korat. Dor S-O-P vîshvavidhyalaya khatir bodol korat. Tumchê faculty ani tanche sôdh dharani vixim sôdh kela tumi dakhaunk zai. Udaharonn: "Professor Sharma's A-I velear kamai mhojem ruchi..."

unnormalised: Kai university kartat te pravesh parixexacho visro naka. BITS Pilani bhaxen sanstha ani kaim rajya-level kolejancho GATE-che veglli parixa aasa. April/Mayache aspas tanchea website-ancher ujvadvak dhyaan dyaat. Tumche sogllim kagdot divpak toiar ravat - transcripts, ID proof (Aadhar sadharanponnan mandun ghetat), ani kaim fautim migration certificatesuy divpak toiar zayat.
normalised: Kain vîshvavidhyalaya karunk lagunk pravesh porixa visorunk naka. B-I-T-S Pilani jexi sanstha ani kain rajya patthachi kolejiche G-A-T-E-an bhair aapanche porixa assa. April vo me bhovtileachem tanche website vêleer jâhirâtê vêleer lakx diunk zai. Tumche sokôd dastâvez sumir korunk toyar zai – transcripts, I-D praman (Aadhar sadharanponnim manun ghetam), ani kednna kednna migration patram sumir korunk zai.

unnormalised: Xevttak, interviewache toyari korat. Tankam tantrik prosn vicharpak xoktat, vo tumchea projectache kamavixin, vo tumchea kshetrantlea vortoman ghoddnukavixinui te vicharpak xoktat. Atmvishvas mhotvacho! Yad dovrat genuine zayat, tumcho utsah dakhoiat, ani zan na zalear mandun gheunk biyonaka. Subhechha ani tumchea applicationsak prepone korat.
normalised: Nimannench, mulakhaatê khatir toyar zai. Te taknîki proxnô vicharunk xaktat, vo tumche proiect kamacher vixim vo tumche mandalik sambhadhanicher. Aat-vîshvas mhotvacho! Khore ravunk yad dôrat, tumche utsalt dakhaunk ani tumchi zannam nâ teô manunk bhoôv diunk naka. Subhechchha ani tumche arz beginuch korat.
